name: ABC Lighting Company
greeting: We specialize in eco-friendly solar lighting solutions for residential and commercial spaces.
businessHours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM, Sunday: Closed
about: ABC Lighting Company has been a leader in sustainable outdoor lighting solutions since 2010. Our products combine cutting-edge solar technology with elegant design to provide reliable, energy-efficient lighting options that reduce carbon footprint while enhancing safety and aesthetics.
